info.description: LLM-powered web extraction API that transforms unstructured websites into clean, typed JSON.
info.title: Refyne API

get.description: Returns available content cleaners with their options. Cleaners process HTML before extraction to reduce tokens or extract main content.

parameters.description: Block until job completes and return results directly. Max wait time is 2 minutes. Returns 202 if timeout exceeded.
parameters.name: wait

schema.description: Block until job completes and return results directly. Max wait time is 2 minutes. Returns 202 if timeout exceeded.

parameters.description: Maximum seconds to wait when wait=true (default 120s, max 120s/2min). For longer jobs, use async mode.
parameters.name: timeout

schema.description: Maximum seconds to wait when wait=true (default 120s, max 120s/2min). For longer jobs, use async mode.

get.description: Returns captured LLM prompts and metadata for debugging extraction issues

Returns job results in the requested format.

Supported formats via Accept header or ?format= query parameter:
- **application/json** (default): JSON array of results
- **application/x-ndjson**: Newline-delimited JSON (one result per line)
- **application/yaml**: YAML formatted results

Query parameters:
- **merge=true**: Merge all page results into a single array
- **format=json|jsonl|yaml**: Override content type

Example:
```bash
# JSON format (default)
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer rf_your_key" \
     https://api.refyne.dev/api/v1/jobs/{id}/results

# JSONL format with merge
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer rf_your_key" \
     "https://api.refyne.dev/api/v1/jobs/{id}/results?format=jsonl&merge=true"
```

parameters.description: Merge all page results into single array
parameters.name: merge

schema.description: Merge all page results into single array

get.summary: Get job results in various formats

get.description:
Server-Sent Events stream for real-time job results.

Events sent:
- **status**: Initial job status and progress updates
- **result**: Each extracted result as it completes
- **complete**: Final status when job finishes
- **error**: Error notifications

The stream sends heartbeat comments every 15 seconds to keep connections alive through proxies.

Example usage with curl:
```bash
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer rf_your_key" \
     -H "Accept: text/event-stream" \
     https://api.refyne.dev/api/v1/jobs/{id}/stream
```

parameters.description: Job ID to stream results from
parameters.name: id

schema.description: Job ID to stream results from
Each oneOf object in the array represents one possible Server Sent Events (SSE) message, serialized as UTF-8 text according to the SSE specification.
schema.title: Server Sent Events

parameters.name: provider

parameters.description: Maximum number of deliveries to return
parameters.name: limit
